text: 3.10 Lom 6.3-5, 8.17, 2 Ko 4.10-11, Gal 6.17, 2 Ti 2.11-12, 1 Pi 4.13 Klays nop nɨgtep gin agɨl nepin. Ne kumɨl tɨkjakɨl, kɨles awl mɨdeb ak nɨgtep gin agɨl abe nepin. Pen mɨŋel awl dɨlɨg mɨdtep gak ak nɨgtep gin agɨl abe nepin. Ne kumak ñɨn ak gos anɨb nɨgak ak, yad abe kumnɨm tek lup agɨl gos anɨb nepin.
